verses.verse: For <S%H3117><s%>, behold, the day cometh <S%H935><s%>, it burneth <S%H1197><s%> as a furnace <S%H8574><s%>; and all the proud <S%H2086><s%>, and all that work <S%H6213><s%> wickedness <S%H7564><s%>, shall be stubble <S%H7179><s%>; and the day <S%H3117><s%> that cometh <S%H935><s%> shall burn them up <S%H3857><s%>, saith <S%H559><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>, that it shall leave <S%H5800><s%> them neither root <S%H8328><s%> nor branch <S%H6057><s%>.

But unto you that fear <S%H3373><s%> my name <S%H8034><s%> shall the sun <S%H8121><s%> of righteousness <S%H6666><s%> arise <S%H2224><s%> with healing <S%H4832><s%> in its wings <S%H3671><s%>; and ye shall go forth <S%H3318><s%>, and gambol <S%H6335><s%> as calves <S%H5695><s%> of the stall <S%H4770><s%>.

And ye shall tread down <S%H6072><s%> the wicked <S%H7563><s%>; for they shall be ashes <S%H665><s%> under the soles <S%H3709><s%> of your feet <S%H7272><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> that I make <S%H6213><s%>, saith <S%H559><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>.

Remember <S%H2142><s%> ye the law <S%H8451><s%> of Moses <S%H4872><s%> my servant <S%H5650><s%>, which I commanded <S%H6680><s%> unto him in Horeb <S%H2722><s%> for all Israel <S%H3478><s%>, even statutes <S%H2706><s%> and ordinances <S%H4941><s%>.

Behold <S%H7971><s%>, I will send you Elijah <S%H452><s%> the prophet <S%H5030><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the great <S%H1419><s%> and terrible <S%H3372><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> come <S%H935><s%>.

And he shall turn <S%H7725><s%> the heart <S%H3820><s%> of the fathers <S%H1><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%>, and the heart <S%H3820><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> to their fathers <S%H1><s%>; lest I come <S%H935><s%> and smite <S%H5221><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> with a curse <S%H2764><s%>.
